channel.title: Search on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Search on Arrans github.io

item.title: BurntSushi/ripgrep
item.description: ripgrep recursively searches directories for a regex pattern while respecting your gitignore

item.title: sharkdp/fd
item.description: A simple, fast and user-friendly alternative to ‘find’

item.title: assafelovic/gpt-researcher
item.description: LLM based autonomous agent that conducts deep local and web research on any topic and generates a long report with citations.

item.title: zincsearch/zincsearch
item.description: ZincSearch . A lightweight alternative to elasticsearch that requires minimal resources, written in Go.

item.title: Genivia/ugrep
item.description: 🔍 ugrep 7.5 file pattern searcher – a user-friendly, faster, more capable grep replacement. Includes a TUI, Google-like Boolean search with AND/OR/NOT, fuzzy search, hexdumps, searches (nested) archives (zip, 7z, tar, pax, cpio), compressed files (gz, Z, bz2, lzma, xz, lz4, zstd, brotli), pdfs, docs, and more

item.title: shivamMg/trie
item.description: A Trie implementation in Go meant for auto-completion use cases. Supports Levenshtein distance search.
